# Welcome

## Topics

::: nonincremental
-   Building predictive multinomial logistic regression models
-   Comparing models
:::

## Computational setup

::: {.cell layout-align="center"}

```{.r .cell-code}
# load packages
library(tidyverse)
library(tidymodels)
library(knitr)
library(colorblindr)
library(themis)

# set default theme and larger font size for ggplot2
ggplot2::theme_set(ggplot2::theme_minimal(base_size = 16))
```
:::

## Terminology

::: question
What's the difference between regression and classification?

::: nonincremental
-   Logistic regression / binary classification
-   Multinomial logistic regression / multinomial classification
:::
:::

## Relevel volcanoes

::: {.cell layout-align="center"}

```{.r .cell-code}
volcano <- volcano %>%
  mutate(
    volcano_type = case_when(
      str_detect(primary_volcano_type, "Stratovolcano") ~ "Stratovolcano",
      str_detect(primary_volcano_type, "Shield") ~ "Shield",
      TRUE ~ "Other"
    ),
    volcano_type = fct_relevel(volcano_type, "Stratovolcano", "Shield", "Other")
  )

volcano %>%
  count(volcano_type)
```


# Build a model

## Split into testing/training

::: {.cell layout-align="center"}

```{.r .cell-code}
set.seed(1234)

volcano_split <- initial_split(volcano)
volcano_train <- training(volcano_split)
volcano_test  <- testing(volcano_split)
```
:::

## Create a recipe

Start with a model that doesn't use geographic information:

::: {.cell layout-align="center"}

```{.r .cell-code  code-line-numbers="|2|3,4|5|6|7"}
volcano_rec1 <- recipe(volcano_type ~ ., data = volcano_train) %>%
  step_rm(latitude, longitude) %>%
  step_other(tectonic_settings) %>%
  step_other(major_rock_1) %>%
  step_dummy(all_nominal_predictors()) %>%
  step_zv(all_predictors()) %>%
  step_center(all_predictors())
```
:::

## Specify a model

::: {.cell layout-align="center"}

```{.r .cell-code}
volcano_spec <- multinom_reg() %>%
  set_engine("nnet")

volcano_spec
```

::: {.cell-output-stdout}
```

Computational engine: nnet 
```
:::
:::

## Create a workflow

::: {.cell layout-align="center"}

```{.r .cell-code  code-line-numbers="|1|2|3"}
volcano_wflow1 <- workflow() %>%
  add_recipe(volcano_rec1) %>%
  add_model(volcano_spec)

```

## ROC curve

ROC curves for multiclass outcomes use a one-vs-all approach: calculate multiple curves, one per level vs. all other levels.

::: {.cell layout-align="center" output-location='slide'}

```{.r .cell-code}
volcano_fit_rs1 %>%
  collect_predictions() %>%
  group_by(id) %>%
  roc_curve(
    truth = volcano_type,
    .pred_Stratovolcano:.pred_Other
  ) %>%
  autoplot()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](lec-25_files/figure-revealjs/unnamed-chunk-19-1.png){fig-align='center' width=90%}
:::
:::

## ROC curve - under the hood

An additional column, `.level`, identifies the "one" column in the one-vs-all calculation:

::: {.cell layout-align="center"}

```{.r .cell-code}

  collect_predictions() %>%
  group_by(id) %>%
  roc_curve(
    truth = volcano_type,
    .pred_Stratovolcano:.pred_Other
  )
```

      // dispatch for htmlwidgets
      const event = window.document.createEvent("Event");
      event.initEvent("slideenter", true, true);
      window.document.dispatchEvent(event);

      // dispatch for shiny
      if (window.jQuery) {
        if (previousSlide) {
          window.jQuery(previousSlide).trigger("hidden");
        }
        if (currentSlide) {
          window.jQuery(currentSlide).trigger("shown");
        }
      }
    }

    // hookup for reveal
    if (window.Reveal) {
      window.Reveal.addEventListener("slidechanged", function(event) {
        fireSlideChanged(event.previousSlide, event.currentSlide);
      });

    // hookup for slidy
    if (window.w3c_slidy) {
      window.w3c_slidy.add_observer(function (slide_num) {
